Table : Aangan_Mandey_year_wise_district_wise_category_wise_details
Purpose : Stores details on the pay scale and working conditions for Aangan Mandey workers in Bihar across different districts for the years 2017-18, 2018-19 and 2019-20. It includes information on education level, designation, and social category, along with salary components, deductions and leave/attendance information.
Column Summary:
state_name : text : - Name of the state where the Aangan Mandey scheme is implemented (Bihar).
focus_area : text : - The department or sector under which the Aangan Mandey data is categorized.
year : text : - The year for which the data is recorded (2017-18, 2018-19, 2019-20).
district_name : text : - Name of the district in Bihar where the Aangan Mandey worker is employed.
education : text : - Educational qualification of the Aangan Mandey worker.
designation : text : - Job title or position of the Aangan Mandey worker.
category : text : - Social category of the Aangan Mandey worker.
deduction_in_rupee : text : - Amount deducted from the Aangan Mandey worker's salary in Indian Rupees.
number_of_absent_days : text : - Number of days the Aangan Mandey worker was absent.
number_of_paid_leave_days : text : - Number of paid leave days taken by the Aangan Mandey worker.
number_of_strike_days : text : - Number of days the Aangan Mandey worker participated in strikes.
other_deduction_in_rupee : text : - Amount of other deductions from the Aangan Mandey worker's salary in Indian Rupees.
salary_in_rupee : text : - Base salary of the Aangan Mandey worker in Indian Rupees.
state_allowance_in_rupee : text : - State allowance provided to the Aangan Mandey worker in Indian Rupees.
total_payable_amount : text : - Total payable amount to the Aangan Mandey worker in Indian Rupees.
total_working_days : text : - Total number of working days for the Aangan Mandey worker in the specified period.

Table : Aangan_Mandey_yearwise_distrcitwise_number_of_workers
Purpose : Stores the workforce distribution details under Biharâ€™s Aangan Mandey scheme across all districts for the years 2017-18, 2018-19, and 2019-20, including counts of Sahaiyaka (helpers), Sevika (workers), and Lady Supervisors by district, education level, and social category.
Column Summary:

category : text : - Social category of the Aangan Mandey worker.
number_of_sahaiyaka : text : - Number of Sahaiyaka (helpers) in the specified district, year, education level, and category.
number_of_sevika : text : - Number of Sevika (workers) in the specified district, year, education level, and category.
number_of_lady_supervisor : text : - Number of Lady Supervisors in the specified district, year, education level, and category.

Table : Artificial_insemination_centres_district_wise
Purpose : Stores data on the number of Artificial Insemination Centres (Government Agencies) across different districts.
Column Summary:
sector_name : varchar : - Name of the sector to which the data belongs.
sector_id : varchar : - Unique identifier for the sector.
focus_area : varchar : - Indicates the specific area or department under focus.
year : varchar : - Year for which the data is recorded (e.g., 2015-16).

Table : Artificial_insemination_performed_on_cattle_distrcit_wise
Purpose : Stores data on the number of artificial inseminations performed on Bonvies, buffalo, and cattle, district-wise.
Column Summary:

Table : Bhagalpur_smartcity_projectwise_progress_report
Purpose : Contains progress details of Bhagalpur Smart City projects in Bihar for the year 2024-25, including project costs, financial and physical progress, and target completion dates across various focus areas.
Column Summary:
state_name : text : - Name of the state where the project is located (Bihar).
district_name : text : - Name of the district where the project is located (Bhagalpur).

project_name : text : - Name of the Smart City project.

Table : Bihar_district_wise_fire_vehicle
Purpose : Stores information about the type, number, and location of fire vehicles in each district of Bihar.
Column Summary:
type_of_fire_vehicle : text : - Type of fire vehicle (e.g., fire engine, water tanker).
number_of_fire_vehicle : text : - Number of fire vehicles of a particular type available.
district_name : text : - Name of the district where the fire vehicles are located.
dist_Code : text : - District code of the district.
latitude : text : - Latitude coordinate of the vehicle's location.
longitude : text : - Longitude coordinate of the vehicle's location.
location_of_vehicle : text : - Specific location or station where the vehicle is stationed.
range_name : text : - Name of the fire service range to which the vehicle belongs.

Table : Bihar_district_wise_water_hydrant
Purpose : Stores data on fire hydrants in Bihar, including source, location (latitude and longitude), fire type classification, hydrant location, district name, district code, and range name.

range_name : text : - Name of the range or area to which the hydrant belongs.
